text:
SAO will be hosting an exhibition on different types of special educational needs (SEN) at 12.30pm - 2.30pm from 28 October 2024 to 1 November 2024 at Diversity Resource Centre* located at S207, Communal Building. During this exhibition, you will have the opportunity to know the unique challenges faced by people with different types of SEN. By trying different software and devices at the Centre, you will know how technology could facilitate students’ learning.
As an incentive, we are offering a complimentary souvenir** to students who:
Visit the Diversity Resource Centre at 12.30pm - 2.30pm from 28 October 2024 to 1 November 2024;
Complete a mini quiz based on the content of the exhibition and the Centre; and
“Follow” our Instagram page on-site to get updated on forthcoming activities.
